query: In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the Trust’s investment objective?
In factsheet_sdpr (State Street SPDR Portfolio ETF), what is the stated net expense ratio or management fee on the fact sheet?
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the Passive Strategy/Index Risk described for the Trust?
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), define “Unit Investment Trust” (if the prospectus defines it).
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), define how “NAV” is described/defined (if explicitly defined).
In factsheet_sdpr, define “duration” (if the fact sheet defines it; otherwise refuse).
In factsheet_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what performance period returns are shown (e.g., 1Y/3Y/5Y) and what are they?
In factsheet_sdpr, what performance period returns are shown (e.g., YTD/1Y/3Y) and what are they?
In factsheet_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), what is the ticker symbol (if listed on the fact sheet)?
In prospectus_sp500 (SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust), summarize the “Passive Strategy/Index Risk” in 1–2 sentences.
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what fees/expenses are described (trust expenses or sponsor fee)?
In prospectus_gold (SPDR Gold Trust), what are the principal risks of investing in the Trust?
